title: Stunning 3BR 2Bath Penthouse Condo- private 2car garage
map_address: N Western Ave near W Le Moyne St
posting_body: Spacious Penthouse occupies entire extra wide 2nd story in boutique elevator building.
Minutes walk to blue line, 606 , downtown Wicker Park/Bucktown, Logan/Palmer Square.
3 large private decks + shared rooftop deck.
Custom drapes, gas fireplace, gourmet kitchen, granite counter tops, SS appliances, 52 bottle wine fridge.
Hardwood oak floors throughout; 11' ceilings w/ custom crown molding.
Master BR includes wall-to-wall windows w/ custom drapes, 2 custom closets w/ built-ins, walk out to private deck.
Master BA just renovated w brand new freestanding tub, heated floor, separate mosaic tiled steam shower w/ multiple shower heads.
Large 2nd and 3rd BRs- both with separate private decks, built-in closets, Large 2nd BA w/ mosaic tiled Jacuzzi tub/shower.
In Unit W/D. RARE 2 car attached/secure/private Garage parking incl with additional gated private drive into garage.
This apartment is truly immaculate w unique finishes throughout.
Rented to same tenant for past 4+ years.
Blue line, coffee, grocer, fitness, bars, restaurants and shops all within blocks.
